dkeep.logic

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.GameObject
      • dkeep.logic.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Guard, Hero, Ogre

    public class Character
extends GameObject
    Represents a game character, derives from GameObject

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Character.State
      Used to express a character state in the game

      • Character

        public Character(Point coord,
                 char symbol,
                 boolean passable,

        Character constructor, calls the GameObject constructor All characters are alive when created

        coord - character coordinates
        symbol - character symbol
        passable - character passable ability
        movable - character movable ability
